headline: Eaton (ETN): Assessing Valuation After a Recent 12% Pullback in the Share Price
summary: Eaton (ETN) has quietly pulled back about 12% over the past month, even as its long term returns remain strong. That combination of recent weakness and multi year strength sets up an interesting discussion about potential entry points. See our latest analysis for Eaton. The recent 12.4% one month share price pullback sits in sharp contrast to Eaton’s powerful three and five year total shareholder returns. This suggests that momentum is cooling for now rather than reversing the longer term...
